name: Block Owl
summary:
Have a problem with stone owls breaking constantly on the ground? Block Owl offers a pair of cannons to help keep your Block Owl safe from disaster by allowing you to shoot cannon balls to help propel the block owl above the ground and out of harms way.   
  
UNIQUE CHARACTER  
Help your Block Owl stay out of harms way.   
  
SIMPLE TAP TAP GAMES GAMEPLAY  
Tap on the left side of the screen to shoot the left cannon and tap the right side of the screen   
  
BLOCK OWL FEATURES  
•	Endless Block Owl Saving  
•	Dual Cannon Firing  
•	Simple Tap Firing Mechanics  
•	Collect as Many Mice as Possible  
•	Get the Highest Score
